story.author: Xphunter
story.headline: Microtransactions funding for moon base?
story.subheading: Microtransactions may not be used for what you think!

article.p: Ever wonder where all the money from gaming microtransactions go? Obviously you would think they go to the company who made the game.
What if I were to tell you the money from microtransactions were all funding a secret moon base?
Interesting leads developing on this story. Check back for more!
